name: jira_search_issues
description: Search for Jira issues using filters or JQL (Jira Query Language). Returns issue summaries with key, status, type, assignee, and other metadata. Use this after discovering available projects with jira_list_projects. For detailed information about a specific issue, use jira_get_issue.

project_key.description: Filter by project key (e.g., 'PROJ', 'ENG'). Optional but recommended to narrow results.

jql.description: Custom JQL query string. If provided, overrides all other filter parameters. Example: 'project = PROJ AND status = Open'

max_results.description: Maximum number of issues to return (default: 50, max: 100)
